order by ${orderByClause}

mapper.insert: insert into pcms_project (REQUEST_ID, REQUEST_TITLE, DETAIL_ACCOUNT, REQUEST_COMPANY_CODE, DETAIL_SUBJECT, REQUEST_DEPT, REQUEST_USER, REQUEST_TELPHONE, REQUEST_EMAIL, REQUEST_INFO, request_dept_name, request_user_name, request_user_name_copy, finance_user, finance_user_name, REQUEST_CREATE_TIME, REQUEST_END_TIME, TYPE, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, CURRENCY, EXCHANGE, balance, status, creat_time, request_json) values (#{requestId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detailAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestCompanyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detailSubject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestTelphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestDeptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestUserNameCopy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{financeUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{financeUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestCreateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestEndTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exchange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{balance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{requestJson,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update pcms_project
REQUEST_ID = #{record.requestId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REQUEST_TITLE = #{record.requestTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DETAIL_ACCOUNT = #{record.detailAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REQUEST_COMPANY_CODE = #{record.requestCompanyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DETAIL_SUBJECT = #{record.detailSubject,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REQUEST_DEPT = #{record.requestDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REQUEST_USER = #{record.requestUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REQUEST_TELPHONE = #{record.requestTelphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REQUEST_EMAIL = #{record.requestEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REQUEST_INFO = #{record.requestInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
request_dept_name = #{record.requestDeptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
request_user_name = #{record.requestUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
request_user_name_copy = #{record.requestUserNameCopy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
finance_user = #{record.financeUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
finance_user_name = #{record.financeUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REQUEST_CREATE_TIME = #{record.requestCreateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REQUEST_END_TIME = #{record.requestEndTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TYPE = #{record.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_USER = #{record.createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

CURRENCY = #{record.currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXCHANGE = #{record.exchange,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
balance = #{record.balance,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{record.status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
creat_time = #{record.creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
request_json = #{record.requestJson,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},

REQUEST_TITLE = #{requestTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update pcms_project set REQUEST_TITLE = #{requestTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DETAIL_ACCOUNT = #{detailAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQUEST_COMPANY_CODE = #{requestCompanyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DETAIL_SUBJECT = #{detailSubject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQUEST_DEPT = #{requestDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQUEST_USER = #{requestUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQUEST_TELPHONE = #{requestTelphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQUEST_EMAIL = #{requestEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQUEST_INFO = #{requestInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, request_dept_name = #{requestDeptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, request_user_name = #{requestUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, request_user_name_copy = #{requestUserNameCopy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, finance_user = #{financeUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, finance_user_name = #{financeUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQUEST_CREATE_TIME = #{requestCreateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQUEST_END_TIME = #{requestEndTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CURRENCY = #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXCHANGE = #{exchange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, balance = #{balance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creat_time = #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, request_json = #{requestJson,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where REQUEST_ID = #{requestId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update pcms_project set REQUEST_TITLE = #{requestTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DETAIL_ACCOUNT = #{detailAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQUEST_COMPANY_CODE = #{requestCompanyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DETAIL_SUBJECT = #{detailSubject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQUEST_DEPT = #{requestDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQUEST_USER = #{requestUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQUEST_TELPHONE = #{requestTelphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQUEST_EMAIL = #{requestEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQUEST_INFO = #{requestInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, request_dept_name = #{requestDeptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, request_user_name = #{requestUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, request_user_name_copy = #{requestUserNameCopy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, finance_user = #{financeUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, finance_user_name = #{financeUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQUEST_CREATE_TIME = #{requestCreateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQUEST_END_TIME = #{requestEndTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CURRENCY = #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXCHANGE = #{exchange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, balance = #{balance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creat_time = #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where REQUEST_ID = #{requestId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT a.REQUEST_ID AS requestId, a.REQUEST_TITLE AS requestTitle, a.REQUEST_COMPANY_CODE AS requestCompanyCode, a.request_dept_name AS requestDept, a.request_user_name AS requestUser, b.person_name AS createUser, a.REQUEST_TELPHONE AS requestTelphone, a.REQUEST_EMAIL AS requestEmail, a.REQUEST_INFO AS requestInfo, a.REQUEST_CREATE_TIME AS requestCreateTime, a.REQUEST_END_TIME AS requestEndTime, a.TYPE AS type FROM pcms_project a LEFT JOIN tpm_employee b ON a.CREATE_USER=b.person_code WHERE a.REQUEST_ID = #{requestId}

SELECT a.DETAIL_CHANNEL AS detailChannel, a.DETAIL_COST AS detailCost, a.DETAIL_WBS AS detailWbs, IFNULL(b.vendor_name,a.DETAIL_VENDOR) AS detailVendor, a.DETAIL_SUBJECT AS detailSubject, a.DETAIL_ACCOUNT AS detailAccount, a.DETAIL_ID AS detailId, a.DETAIL_AMOUNT AS detailAmount, a.DETAIL_STANDARD AS detailStandard, a.DETAIL_TASK AS detailTask, a.DETAIL_MEMO AS detailMemo FROM pcms_project_deatil a LEFT JOIN pcms_supplier b ON a.DETAIL_VENDOR=b.vendor_id WHERE REQUEST_ID = #{requestId}

SELECT a.detail_id AS detailId, a.request_id AS requestId, a.vendor_id AS vendorId, a.mrname3, a.cost, a.unit, a.note, a.comparison_price AS comparisonPrice, a.specifications3, a.CHILDREN3_DETAIL AS children3Detail, a.CHILDREN3_VENDOR AS children3Vendor, a.CHILDREN3_BUILDTIME AS children3Buildtime, a.CHILDREN3_COUNT AS children3Count, a.CHILDREN3_PRICE AS children3Price, a.CHILDREN3_AMOUNT AS children3Amount, a.create_time AS createTime, a.otid FROM pcms_othertm_source AS a WHERE a.detail_id =#{detailId}

SELECT a.detail_id AS detailId, a.resuest_id AS resuestId, a.vendor_id AS vendorId, a.CHILDREN1_TASK AS children1Task, a.CHILDREN1_LAST_BUILDTIME AS children1LastBuildtime, a.CHILDREN1_TYPE AS children1Type, a.CHILDREN1_REASON AS children1Reason, a.CHILDREN1_AREA AS children1Area, a.CHILDREN1_LINEAR AS children1Linear, a.CHILDREN1_BUILDTIME AS children1Buildtime, a.CHILDREN1_VENDOR AS children1Vendor, a.CHILDREN1_INNER AS children1Inner, a.CHILDREN1_OUTER AS children1Outer, a.CHILDREN1_AMOUNT AS children1Amount, a.create_time AS createTime, a.scid FROM pcms_showcase_source AS a WHERE a.detail_id =#{detailId}

SELECT a.project_id, a.vendor_id, b.vendor_name, a.request_id, a.project_name, a.fee_detail_type, a.dept, c.org_name AS deptName, a.city, a.cost_center, a.wbs, a.order_no, a.total_fee, a.projected_sales_no, a.projected_sales_money, a.estimated_cost_rate, a.note FROM tpm_activity_original AS a LEFT JOIN pcms_supplier b ON a.vendor_id=b.vendor_id LEFT JOIN tpm_dept c ON a.dept=c.org_code WHERE a.request_id = #{requestId}

SELECT a.mrid, a.mrtype, a.mrcode, a.mrname, a.cost, a.specifications, a.unit, a.unit_price AS unitPrice, a.number, a.comparison_price AS comparisonPrice, a.`status`, a.note FROM pcms_material_source AS a WHERE activity_id=#{project_id}

SELECT a.sid, a.REQUEST_ID AS requestId, a.SHOP_CRM_CODE AS shopCrmCode, a.SHOP_NAME AS shopName, a.SHOP_LEVEL AS shopLevel, a.SHOP_BRANCH AS shopBranch, a.SHOP_CUSTOMER AS shopCustomer, a.SHOP_CHANNEL AS shopChannel, a.SHOP_PROVINCE AS shopProvince, a.SHOP_CITY AS shopCity, a.SHOP_COUNTY AS shopCounty, a.DETAIL_TASK AS detailTask, a.SHOP_SALES_AMOUNT AS shopSalesAmount FROM pcms_shop AS a WHERE a.REQUEST_ID = #{requestId}
SELECT * FROM pcms_project WHERE DATE_FORMAT( REQUEST_END_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = #{synDate}
SELECT SUM(item_price) AS sumMoney, IFNULL(SUM(subclass),0) AS sumSubclass FROM pcms_item WHERE request_id = #{requestId}
SELECT org_name FROM tpm_dept WHERE org_code=#{requestDept}
SELECT person_name FROM tpm_employee WHERE person_code =#{requestUser}
